trans-unit.source: Represents a data view in the data store.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma vista de dados no arquivo de dados.

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataView class is one of several types that represent the schema of a data store at design-time.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DesignerDataView é um dos vários tipos que representam o esquema de um arquivo de dados no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: These schema items are made available to controls by designers implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment> interface.
trans-unit.target: Estes itens do esquema são disponibilizadas para controlos pelos designers implementar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment>

trans-unit.source: Controls access schema objects by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A> method of the interface.
trans-unit.target: Controla o acesso a objetos de esquema ao chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>método da interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.GetConnectionSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DesignerDataView class represents a single data view in the data store.
trans-unit.target: A classe de DesignerDataView representa uma vista de dados individual no arquivo de dados.

trans-unit.source: A collection of DesignerDataView objects is returned when you call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A> method with the `schemaClass` parameter set to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos de DesignerDataView é devolvida quando chamar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A>método com o `schemaClass` parâmetro definido como <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataSchemaClass.Views?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDesignerDataSchema.GetSchemaItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"></xref> class with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"> </xref> classe com o nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"></xref> class with the specified name and owner.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataView"> </xref> classe com o nome especificado e o proprietário.

trans-unit.source: The data-store owner of the view.
trans-unit.target: O proprietário do arquivo de dados da vista.
